transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Sir, Simran baat kar rahi thi IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan ji bolo aap dekha aapne isko.
Executive: Haan ji, ye maine dekha. Sir, ye isiliye aa raha hai kyunki categories vagarah ko lekar na thoda concerned rehte hain, theek hai? Kyunki hamari jo services chal rahi hai na, wo premium chal rahi hai, right?
Customer: Kya premium mam, ek minute, 1% ka order nahi aa raha hai. Kis cheez ka premium kehte hain wo aap in...
Executive: Inquiries vagarah dekhte hain aap?
Customer: Kis cheez ko premium kehte hain wo aap, main to ye nahi samajh pa raha hu aap.
Customer: Kis cheez ko premium kehte hain? Aap you are doing a job, mujhe aap se aise nahi baat karna chahiye but ye jo premium word use karte ho na bada ganda sa lag raha hai. I have paid huge amount.
Customer: But I'm not getting a proper service.
Executive: [inaudible]
Customer: Most of most of most of the time you guys are giving me excuses.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Hai na? Agar nahi samajh mein aata to mera shift kar do usi mein aap TrustSeal mein. Aayi baat samajh mein?
Executive: Sir, mujhe aapka account abhi assign hua hai.
Customer: Abhi nahi hua hai mam, jab se mera service hui hai tab se assign hua hai aapko. Kya kiya hai aapne in between bataoge mujhe? Kya kiya kya hai aapne is account mein bataoge mujhe aap?
Executive: Sir, maine ye account abhi isi mahine handle karna start kara hai.
Customer: Isi mahine mein kya kiya aapne wahi mujhe bata do.
Customer: Aap kiya kya hai aapne aisa extraordinary isme?
Customer: Kuch bataoge aap mujhe?
Executive: Sir, meri aap se baat hui thi and humne aapka air and category mein bhi convert karwaya.
Customer: Kuch bhi nahi. Kya kya conversion aaya kya report bhejoge mujhe aap? Kitne conversion hue hain?
Executive: Sir, conversion ka mujhe aap bataenge na.
Customer: Kuch nahi ho raha hai conversion. Matlab usse bhi ghatiya response aa raha hai, main bata raha hu.
Executive: Sir, wo main aap se baat karungi tab mujhe pata chalega na.
Customer: To kyun nahi call kiya mam? Kyun nahi call kiya aapne?
Executive: Sir, aapka bhi mere ko concern aaya to main bhi to resolve ke liye baithi hu is baat hi.
Customer: Mam, kya concern kya resolve? Kya concern? Aapne jo premium word kiya na mujhse mujhe irritation ho gayi hai ki premium premium kya premium hota hai bataoge mujhe aap?
Executive: Sir, jo hamari services hai premium jisme star aata hai. Nahi kya uska outcome kya hai? What is the outcome? I'm talking about outcome. I'm talking about productivity. Where is the productivity mam?
Customer: [silence]
Customer: Productivity kaha hai bataoge mujhe aap?
Customer: Nahi samajh mein aata hai to chhod do aap account.
Customer: Premium word jo use karte hain na ganda sa lagta hai ki matlab samajh mein nahi aata kya. Ji maine aapko bahut premium kya premium diya hai aapne?
Customer: Kya improvement hai bataoge mujhe aap?
Executive: Sir, main aapka jab services dekhungi aur acche se to mujhe pata chalega.
Customer: Kab dekhoge mam? Uska uske liye koi matlab special occasion aayega services dekhne ke liye? One year ki service hai. Already two months nikal chuka hai. Kab dekhoge aap mujhe bataoge mujhe?
Executive: Sir, mere paas aapka jaise main account handle kar rahi hu, mere paas aur bhi kaafi clients rehte hain, mujhe sabka.
Customer: Mam, to phir ek baat bol mana kar do aap nahi handle kar pa rahe ho to chhod do isko. Chhod do kisi aur ko do.
Executive: Sir, aisa nahi hai. Maine ye to nahi kaha na.
Customer: Maine ye to nahi kaha.
Customer: Phir kya kehna chahte ho jogesh ji phir premium service hai, premium hai to matlab aur bhi foundation laga rakha hai aapne premium ke naam se.
Executive: Main category ki baat kar rahi thi. Main to category ki baat kar rahi thi sir.
Customer: To kya baat kar rahe ho aap mujhe kya karna chahiye ab sab kuch mujhe aap se puch puch ke karna hoga matlab iska matlab itni premium de di aapne service mujhe.
Customer: Itni premium service de di aapne ki agar agar ek ladka isme product bhi add karega to aap se puch ke add karega?
Executive: Sir, main aisa karti hu main aapka na call mere manager ko transfer karwa deti hu, theek hai? Wo aapko abhi call back kar lenge.
Customer: Kaun karega wo Vijay karega call?
Executive: Nahi nahi sir, Ashraf sir.
Customer: Kya Ashraf se baat karu? Baat to kiya tha wahi banda main ye kar raha hu wo kar raha hu.
Customer: Aap mujhe result do. Mujhe 10 logo se nahi baat karni. Kya baat karunga jara batao mujhe usse. Baat batao na kya baat karu Ashraf se?
Executive: Sir, aap jo problems face kar rahe hain main uske concern pe leke.
Customer: To problem aap batao na main sabse baith ke baat karta firu kya mera apna business hai madam?
Executive: Sir, main samajh rahi hu business hai aapka.
Customer: To phir main Ashraf se baat karu phir Vijay se baat karu wo banda jaise kaam se bahra ho se karta hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi. Sir, aapko kisi aur se baat nahi karni hai na aapko Ashraf sir se hi baat karni hai.
Customer: Ashraf se Ashraf se baat karke aap resolve karke do main multiple logo ke nahi ke liye nahi call karne ke liye pay kiya hu. Agar aap payment karoge to 10 logo ko call karte firoge kya?
Customer: Aap batao na aap meri jagah rahoge to 10 logo se call kar aap se nahi resolve hota kya aapke level pe?
Executive: Sir, hota hai aisa nahi hai.
Customer: To phir to phir aapko jyada acche se guide kar denge kyunki aapka account because kyunki na wo mere manager hai kyunki aapka account mere paas.
Executive: Ashraf ka message aa raha hai mere paas.
Executive: Aa raha hai na? Haan ji.
Customer: Hmm. To phir kya karu main usse kya kahu? Aap aap guide karo us bande ko.
Executive: Sir, he's been calling you na.
Executive: Actually mere paas abhi abhi account aaya hai Ashraf sir.
Customer: Madam, mujhe result chahiye. Madam, mujhe result chahiye. Agar aap se nahi sambhalta hai to chhod do. Seedhi si baat hai. Nahi sambhalta na cheezon ko drop kar do aap.
Customer: Theek hai na?
Customer: Simply agar ye premium word use karoge to mujhse ye cheeze digest nahi hongi. Aayi baat samajh mein?
Customer: Kya diya hai aapne premium batao aap mujhe aap explain kar sakte ho isko? Aisa kya extraordinary de diya aapne?
Customer: Mujhe result chahiye madam. Main result oriented aadmi hu. Samajh mein aata hai to theek hai otherwise isko switch kar do aap.
Customer: TrustSeal mein deni chahiye iski service. Theek hai?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Yes sir, I will just mere manager call kar rahe hain sir please try to understand.
Customer: Aapko aapke manager aapko call kar rahe hain?
Executive: Sir, aapko call kar rahe hain.
Customer: Mere paas koi call nahi aa raha hai kisi ka.
Executive: Sir, main call drop karungi uske baad aayega na.
Customer: Okay okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting expected results.

- Irritated by the term 'premium' service.

- Expresses frustration with multiple points of contact.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to transfer the call to manager.

- Customer wants resolution from a single point of contact.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- Executive will have manager call the customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- premium service, results, escalation, account handling
